column3: Setup: If you have not done so already, use the publisher_csv_upload testdrive to setup for this test at /testdrive/publisher_csv_upload
Log in as the publisher account specified by the testdrive result

Go to the 'Validate your Journal CSV' tab in the publisher dashboard

http://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/publisher/journal-csv

Click 'Choose File' and select a CSV file with invalid data

Test Resource: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DOAJ/doaj/feature/3850_link_editor_groups_by_name/doajtest/doajtest/example_files/publisher_csv_invalid_data.csv

column4: You are shown a set of validation errors.  The following are the expected errors
Row 2 and Row 6 were not found in DOAJ
Row 3 is owned by another user
Row 4 did not provide any updates to the journal
Row 5 changed the journal title, which is not permitted
Row 7 had a selection of validation errors.  The errors are identified, and the original and newly supplied values are shown

column3: If you are finished testing, you can teardown the testdrive using the link provided.  If you are going to continue with the other tests in this suite you can leave the testdrive in place until the very end
